TermUI
  • The Text Object
  • View page source

The Text Object

The text object is how you put text on the screen.

Creation

from TermUI.text import Text
from TermUI.position import Position

text = Text("I love TermUI!", Position(0,0))

Properties

Some properties are properties of The Basic Element which apply to all elements and will not be repeated here.

Instance

text: str - The text that is displayed in this element.

underlined: bool - Whether the text should be underlined.

Methods

Some methods are methods of The Basic Element which apply to all elements and will not be repeated here.

Instance

set_text(text: str) -> None - Set the text displayed by the element.
